simplified: 不怕不识货，就怕货比货
traditional: 不怕不識貨，就怕貨比貨
pinyin: bu4 pa4 bu4 shi2 huo4 , jiu4 pa4 huo4 bi3 huo4

definitions.bu4 pa4 bu4 shi2 huo4 , jiu4 pa4 huo4 bi: lit. don't worry about not knowing goods, but about comparing them (proverb); fig. goods' (or person's) true value can only be determined through comparison;
